page.title: 04Crocadon Farm History
page.content: Crocadon most probably is recorded in the original Doomsday book. Local records acknowledge its existence since 1237. In the{seventeenth century there was a fire which destroyed much of the farmhouse. The owner-occupiers then were the Tillie family. They considered it unlucky to continue living there so they built Pentillie castle on the banks of the river Tamar, 1\ miles away. Most of the estate has sinced remained in the Tillie/Coryton family. At the start of the{twentieth century much of{Viverdon Down}was reclaimed and incorperated into the estate. Mr Bush has been the tenant since 1970. He no longer uses part of the large farmhouse or the old{farm buildings}. Most of the doorways are too low, indicating that modern man is much taller than even 200 years ago.
